title: Men's Health Over 50
description: Men's Health over 50 is a book of tips and health advice, interspersed with a large dose of common sense, suitable for any man reaching the age milestone who wishes to preserve good health..Stay Fit or Life by following CW's simple and insightful advice, discussing ways to improve your general health and continue to enjoy a full and active life.The book is written specifically for men but most of the information would be equally useful to women.Chapter 1 - Eating WellChapter 2 - Exercise Your BodyChapter 3 - Weight BalanceChapter 4 - Exercise Your MindChapter 5 - Common Over 50 ConcernsAppendices
author: CW Piper
